jobDescription: The Security Officer is responsible for the protection, safeguarding, safety, and security of assets, property, team members, clients and all visitors at all United Shore locations. This Security Officer will be dressed in plain clothes, unarmed and use various telecommunications devices to call for assistance from fire fighters, police forces, and emergency medical services.
